title: Blended Learning for Enhancing Core Competencies in Pharmacology

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Pharmacology education program combining mobile-accessible micro-content with intensive offline workshops, targeting professionals in medical translation and international clinical research support roles

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the pharmacokinetic properties of neurotransmitters and major disease treatments with at least 80% accuracy
Learners can perform drug interaction simulations using digital tools and identify at least three risk factors
Learners can develop and present drug therapy protocols applicable to real clinical scenarios in team-based projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
